entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Cornwall
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:37 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint-Anicet 6:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Temperature: 1.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 1.0°C
Wind: ENE 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain. Temperature rising to 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Temperature rising to 6 by morning. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. Temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early in the afternoon. Temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. A few flurries beginning early in the evening and ending after midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
